nodes.text: Rik's Cantina was a cantina in the Undercity of Coruscant, a frequent haunt of Cade Skywalker, Deliah Blue, and Jariah Syn around 137 ABY that appeared to be on the very planetary surface itself. It was owned by the Hutt, Queen Jool, who lived in a swamp below the cantina. Jool enforced a strict no-fighting rule within, and had a cybernetic eye, with which she could monitor the goings on throughout. The bartender was Finn, a no-nonsense being who would not hesitate to use deadly force to enforce the house rules. A common fixture at Rik's was the gambler Naxy Screeger.
Holoscreens transmitting podracing and live dancers entertained the clientele.

In 137 ABY, Cade stopped by the bar before his attempt to infiltrate the Temple of the Sith and leave Jool instructions in case he did not return: to hand over the access codes to the Mynock to Jariah and Deliah. Also expected Deliah and Jariah were Chak and Kee, who had rented their ship, the Grinning Liar to them. After seeing Cade, they hoped to intimidate him into revealing his crew's whereabouts, but failed.
The Nautolan Jak passed Cade as he entered the bar. He was the club's bouncer.
